faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Get answers to common queries about our Video Enhancer

items.title: What types of enhancements can WaveSpeed apply to videos?
items.description: WaveSpeed AI can brighten dark videos, reduce noise, enhance resolution, stabilize shaky footage, and more. Our technology intelligently analyzes and improves video quality.

items.title: Is WaveSpeed free to use?
items.description: Absolutely! Each user gets 30 free enhancement credits daily, perfect for enhancing numerous videos. You can earn more credits through surveys or community challenges. For frequent users, we offer economical subscription plans.

items.title: Can I use enhanced videos for commercial purposes?
items.description: Users on any paid plan can utilize enhanced content commercially. Free-tier users may use enhanced videos for personal projects but cannot commercially exploit them. For specific inquiries, please consult our Terms of Service.

items.title: How does your privacy protection work?
items.description: WaveSpeed processes all videos directly in your browser, ensuring they are never uploaded or stored externally. Your videos remain private and secure, with all data cleared when the session ends.

footer.heading: Ready to Upgrade Your Videos?
footer.description: Try WaveSpeed AI today and witness the enhancement yourself. No signup required.
